summary: This bill mandates the Commander of United States Cyber Command to create a roadmap for collaboration between the Department of Defense and industry on artificial intelligence-enabled cyber capabilities. The roadmap, due by August 1, 2026, involves coordination with various defense officials and will establish a framework for integrating AI into offensive and defensive cyberspace operations. It will address collaboration mechanisms, security requirements, technology transition, infrastructure, and organizational structures, with briefings to congressional defense committees regarding the roadmap and its progress.
